name: virtual-location-google-street-view-etc
description: Integrates Google Map, Google Street View, PixAI, Stability.ai, ComfyUI API and Bluesky to provide a virtual location simulation in LLM (written in Effect.ts)

env.time_scale: (Optional:Scale of travel time on real roads duration. default 4)
env.rembg_path: (absolute path of the installed rembg cli)
env.pixAi_modelId: (Optional: pixAi ModelId, if not set use default model 1648918127446573124
env.comfy_url: (Option: Generate image using ComfyUI API at specified URL. Example: http://192.168.1.100:8188)
env.comfy_workflow_t2i: (Optional: Path to API workflow file when using text to image with ComfyUI. If not specified: assets/comfy/t2i_sample.json)
env.comfy_workflow_i2i: (Optional: Path of API workflow file when image to image in ComfyUI. If not specified: assets/comfy/i2i_sample.json)
env.comfy_params: (Optional: Variable values to send to the workflow via comfyUI API)
env.fixed_model_prompt: (Optional: Fixed avatar generation prompt. You will no longer be able to change your avatar during conversations.)
env.bodyAreaRatio: (Optional: Acceptable avatar image area ratio. default 0.042)
env.bodyHWRatio: (Optional: Acceptable avatar image aspect ratios. default 1.5~2.3)
env.bodyWindowRatioW: (Optional: Avatar composite window horizontal ratio. default 0.5)
env.bodyWindowRatioH: (Optional: Avatar composite window aspect ratio. default 0.75)
env.filter_tools: (Optional: Directly filter the tools to be used. All are available if not specified. e.g. tips,set_traveler_location)
env.moveMode: (Option: Specify whether the movement mode is realtime or skip. default realtime)

examples.title: Travel to Tokyo
examples.description: Instruct the avatar to travel to Tokyo Station.

examples.title: Current Location Info
examples.description: Get the current location information of the avatar.
